arabic_text: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخۡلَصٗا وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا
translation: (51) And mention in the Book, Moses. Indeed, he was chosen, and he was a messenger and a prophet.[817]
footnotes: [817]- A messenger (rasūl) is one who was charged by Allāh to reform society.  A prophet (nabī) is one who received revelation from Allāh, the latter being more numerous than the former.
